name: Country Farming: Big Farm Game
description:
Do you wish to escape to the country side? Do you want to manage a farm and become a farm tycoon? Harvest fresh produce, raise livestocks, sell the organic produce and make a profit. Tell friends and townsman about the farm frenzy, the fresh produce & organic foods are from “my farm” and make new farm story in the newest farm simulation game - Country Farming: Big Farm Frenzy Simulation Game. The game will provide you the joy of farming as well as tests your time & resource management skills.

Country Farming: Big Farm Frenzy Simulation Game is a farm adventure game that simulates the various tasks of farmers. It is a unique blend of farming simulation and supermarket game! Build your dream farm and lead a fulfilling country life with a dash of farm frenzy! Raise livestocks, harvest fresh crops at the farm, process them at your facilities, and sell goods for profits. You will soon be a farm tycoon.

Features:

* Grow fresh crops and harvest the most delicious organic crops
* FEED lovely livestock & cute pets
* Free to play best Farming Game
* Upgrade to unlimited barn space
* Farming adventure at its best with non-stop gameplay! Harvest more, unlock more, experience more!
* Plant, harvest, and process over 200+ unique organic and fresh produce.
* More than 100+ Achievements to complete to make your farm tycoon journey exciting
* Fulfill daily orders and quests with your farm products
* New missions added regularly to challenge your ranching and farming skills.
* Farms to manage and expand - Build, decorate and expand your country farm make it the most beautiful farmville

App Notes:

* This app requires an active internet connection to play, please make sure your device is connected while playing.
*The game completely free to download and free to play, however, in-app purchases are available for additional content and in-game currency
